title: StarCraft 2: Elazer counters Bly's SPINE RUSH with a SPINE RUSH!
excerpt: Best-of-5 series of high level StarCraft 2 from the ESL SC2 Masters Summer Europe between Elazer and Bly. One of the most fun series of Zerg vs Zerg I've seen in a while.
